thread.section_title: SmartBuyGlasses USA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SmartBuyGlasses USA | www.smartbuyglasses.com | 4 of 168
thread.title: SA

author: SA
title: SA
text: I've bought from smartbuyglasses quite a few times, and they've always shipped within the time frame indicated. Do take note of this: if it says Fast Shipping on the product you're buying, you can expect the turnaround to be very quick. If it says Ships in 5 to 11 working days, the expect to wait those 5 to 11 working days. They've never let me down :) Plus, the prices are awesome. Smartbuyglasses is my go-to.
